# Frontend Development Guidelines

## Documentation
Before working on frontend code, review:
- #file:frontend/README.md for architecture details
- #file:LOCAL_SETUP.md for setup requirements

## Frontend Rules
Use the established React patterns in the project. Focus on component reusability and maintainability.

## When to Update Documentation
Update #file:frontend/README.md when:
- Adding new components
- Changing routing structure
- Modifying state management
- Adding new libraries
